about.description: We serve fried chicken tenders baskets and sandwiches.

menu.title: Tenders
menu.description: Pickle-brined white meat tenders fried to a crispy perfection. Each tender basket comes with waffle fries and sauce.

menu.title: Sandwiches
menu.description: All sandwiches served with waffle fries.

items.name: Watson's Hot
items.description: Crunchy chicken tenders dipped in Watson's Hot, served on a brioche bun with creamy coleslaw, dill pickles, & comeback sauce.

items.name: Buffalo Starchild
items.description: Crunchy chicken tenders tossed in buffal sauce, served on a brioche bun with sorghum glazed bacon, black pepper ranch, blue cheese crumbles, & mixed greens.

items.name: Classic Fried
items.description: Crunchy fried chicken tenders with herb mayo, dill pickles, and mixed greens on a brioche bun.

items.name: Classic Grilled
items.description: Grilled chicken tenders with herb mayo, dill pickles, and mixed greens on a brioche bun.

items.name: Watson's Hot Fish
items.description: Fried perch dipped in Watson's hot sauce served on a hoagie roll with creamy coleslaw, dill pickles, and comeback sauce.

items.name: Tofu Po'boy
items.description: Crispy tofu served on a hoagie roll with mixed greens, dill pickles, red onion, and vegan remoulade.

about.description: Mobile wood-fired pizza trailer serving Neapolitan style pizza to the Champaign-Urbana area

items.name: Margherita
items.description: Fresh mozzarella cheese with basil leaves and an olive oil drizzle over red San Marzano sauce--a Neapolitan classic!

items.name: Funghi
items.description: Fresh mushroom, herbs and cheese over white sauce, finished with truffle oil

items.name: BBQ Chicken Ranch
items.description: Tender smoked chicken, real bacon, and our shredded mozzarella atop a BBQ sauce base, and finished with a swirl of house-made buttermilk ranch on top

items.name: Sweet Heat
items.description: Char and cup pepperoni with a bold twist—Mike's Hot Honey—atop our cheese blend and San Marzano tomato base.

items.name: Buffalo Chicken
items.description: Tender, smoked chicken and our shredded mozzarella cheese, drizzled in buffalo and house-made buttermilk ranch

items.name: Supreme
items.description: Sausage, pepperoni, fresh mushroom, olive, onion and fire roasted red pepper, with our cheese blend and San Marzano tomato sauce.

items.name: Garden/Veggie Supreme
items.description: Mushroom, olives, onion and fire roasted red pepper covered in our mozzarella blend, all on top of crushed San Marzano tomato sauce.

items.name: Motz Lover
items.description: Fresh mozzarella on top of our shredded mozzarella all melted on top of our San Marzano tomato base

items.name: Hotta Ricotta
items.description: Sausage and basil over San Marzano sauce, topped with shredded mozzarella then finished with dollops of ricotta and a drizzle of hot honey

items.name: Meat-za
items.description: Pepperoni, sausage and bacon smothered by our shredded mozzarella on our San Marzano tomato base. Try it with Mike’s Hot Honey for an extra kick!

items.name: Cheese Pizza (Build Your Own)
items.description: Any of our toppings, any of our sauces--prepared your way
